title: Self-Directed Learning Design Utilizing Equivalence-Based Instruction (EBI) in Higher Education

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding foundational learning theories and proficiency in utilizing online learning tools
context.additional_context: Targets general citizens with intermediate social science expertise, aiming to strengthen self-directed learning abilities in real-time online environments using digital devices.

learning_goals: Learners can derive core social science concepts with 90% accuracy by applying stimulus equivalence principles.
Learners can generate five or more derived relationships per week using self-directed mastery-based learning strategies.
Learners can demonstrate relational reasoning between concepts at over 80% performance using EBI-based assessment tools.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
